```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
read_excel("enrollmentrace.xlsx")
schoolrace <- read_excel("enrollmentrace.xlsx")
schoolraces <- schoolrace[-c(1, 5),]
race_ratio <- schoolraces$Percent
race_ratios <- as.numeric(race_ratio)
```

```{r}
#mutate(race_percent=race_ratio*100)
racepercents <- race_ratios*100
race_name <- schoolraces$Label
ggplot(schoolraces,aes(x=race_name,y=racepercents,fill=race_name)) + geom_col() + labs(title="Community School Student Race Demographics",subtitle="2021-2022",caption= "Source: LCPS Dashboard",x="Race",y="Percent of School Population",) + guides(fill = guide_legend(title = "Race")) 
```
